label: General Resume | Ian Murphy
objective: Seeking a position at Technology Corp  where I can apply my superior technology skills to ensure a high level of efficiency and productivity.
profile: Results driven, perfectionist, multi-language full stack engineer who is highly motivated, flexible, and team oriented.

experience.title: Software Engineer III
experience.description: Ported, profiled, and optimized complex genomic analysis algorithms with the goal of conforming code to organizational standards, increasing algorithm performance, and decreasing operational costs.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Used agile methodologies to satisfy rapidly changing requirements and deliver production grade features ahead of time as part of a team. Designed and developed a high availability, performance-oriented technical service document delivery application and worked closely with out-of-country teams to integrate experimental APIs. Ensured customer satisfaction of commercial vehicle information applications and microservices through the creation of automated end to end tests and the standardization of development and deployment procedures.
results: Decrease in deployment validation times for critical applications

experience.title: Automation Engineer
experience.description: Automated validation processes for Intel's Dynamic Tuning product.  Triaged and debugged failing tests.

experience.title: Cloud Automation Intern
experience.description: Lead efforts to consolidate steps involved in decommissioning enterprise infrastructure and developed self-service VM decommissioning tools. Was tasked with evaluating and supplying recommendations for the purchase of third party software amounting to more than $200k.
results: Solved the infrastructure decommissioning "million dollar problem".
Greater than 90% reduction in time to decommission VMs

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Designed and developed self-service developer tools for product licensing, visual API testing, and building evaluation software. Dockerized high-performance video network monitoring appliance software. Created Cloud provider images (AMIs) from marketplace base OS images for network video monitoring products.
results: 98% reduction in developer time spent obtaining Product licenses
99% reduction in Product software package build time

experience.title: R&D Intern
experience.description: Oversaw office-wide Windows 10 workstation upgrades. Performed out of box setup and installation of new workstations.

experience.title: R&D Intern
experience.description: Accelerated internal documentation software migration by designing format conversion scripts in Python. Dockerized inventory managment software. Performed intra-office tech support.

education.subject: Software Engineering
education.summary: GPA 3.61 Â· Emplaced a solid foundation for analyzing problems and providing practical solutions.  Courses included Software Testing, Data Structures, Design Patterns, Operating Systems, Embedded Networking, and Advanced Unix.

skills.name: Jenkins
skills.desc: Experience using Jenkins to automate software distribution and site reliability tests.

skills.name: Git
skills.desc: Experience with using CLI Git and GitLab to collaborate on a team and control software versions.

projects.title: Soundcloud-Lib
projects.description: Created after Soundcloud deleted my approved API app so that my Discord bot project could continue to play music in voice channels. Scrapes a public API key from the Soundcloud site and uses it to access the private API.
features: Creates an MP3 with embedded metadata (title, artist, album art)

projects.title: Sling
projects.description: A room based sharing and collaboration site that features, Text, Audio, and Video Chat, File Sharing, and Desktop sharing via a Chrome extension.  Most realtime communication went over WebSockets, but video and audio data was transmitted peer to peer.  Anyone could make or join a room without an account and room access was granted via share codes.
features: Securely share Text, File, Audio, Webcam, and Desktop data within a Room
Accountless creation and permanent deletion of Rooms

projects.title: PyCodeExec
projects.description: Poorly named library that allows for the safe execution of code from several supported languages via Docker.  This python library spins up a heavily restricted Docker container and executes the provided code.
features: Safely execute and return output from arbitrary code

projects.title: resume-generator
projects.description: A tool I created to allow me to generate custom tailored resumes for different positions.  This resume you are looking at right now was generated with this tool.
features: Uses a data file to populate a template
Everything I could possibly want to change is a parameter in that data file

name: General Resume | Ian Murphy
